Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, front pockets and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fleece gloves with elastication at the wrists.
Knee-length cycling shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.

Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and canvas insoles.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and mesh linings and insoles.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation suede with a perforated pattern on top, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and patterned soles.
Short jacket in soft imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with lace trims and embroidery at the top. Small stand-up collar with a frill trim and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a lace trim at the front and gathers at the back. Frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with frill trims. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a rounded collar, sewn-on ties at the top and buttons down the front. Yoke at the front with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned, frill-trimmed cuffs.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, side and back pockets and a zip fly and button.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-neck. Narrow elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Long metal earrings with a plastic bead at the bottom. Length 9 cm.
Trainers in imitation suede with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Winter running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbed sections for increased mobility. Hood with narrow elastication around the edge, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Reflective details, a side pocket with a concealed zip, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut blouse in a softly draping weave with a high, gently draped collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long, wide puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, long, wide puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back, long sleeves, rounded, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Longer, sleeveless top in patterned, pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline, slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem.

Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable, adjustable braces.
Sports jacket with a high collar, zip down the front and contrasting colour panels down the sleeves. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports jacket with a high collar, zip down the front and contrasting colour panels down the sleeves. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sandals in satin with covered heels, a strap over the foot and lacing with long straps that tie around the legs. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 10.7 cm.
Sandals in satin with covered heels, adjustable, wrapover ankle straps and narrow straps over the feet, one of which is decorated with sparkly stones. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Sandals in imitation suede with lacing at the front, an ankle-height shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sandals in imitation suede with lacing at the front, an ankle-height shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and an ankle strap that is elasticated at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6 cm.

Court shoes with pointed toes. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with smocking over the bust, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and a seam below the bust. Unlined.

Body in soft microfibre with a lace section under the bust. Straight cut at the top and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, high-cut legs, a high cut at the back and lined gusset. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a smooth silhouette.

Ankle-length jumpsuit woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck at the back, and twisted rope shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back, a low crotch and side pockets. Pleats at the waist and straight, softly draping legs. Lined.
V-neck kaftan in patterned satin with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Concealed pockets in the side seams and an asymmetric hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton with a collar, button placket and press-studs at the crotch.
